events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--006a51241073e994b41acfe9ec718e94-->
### Code Coverage & Benchmarks
For details see: https://corecheck.dev/bitcoin/bitcoin/pulls/32439.
<!--021abf342d371248e50ceaed478a90ca-->
### Reviews
See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process.
| Type | Reviewers |
| ---- | --------- |
| Concept ACK | [Sjors](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/32439#issuecomment-2862895879), [laanwj](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/32439#issuecomment-2862367684) |

If your review is incorrectly listed, please react with ðŸ‘Ž to this comment and the bot will ignore it on the next update.
<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#25573](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25573) ([POC] guix: produce a fully `-static-pie` bitcoind by fanquake)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
<!--5faf32d7da4f0f540f40219e4f7537a3-->

Concept ACK

Some more context: https://issues.guix.gnu.org/76503

verification.payload:
tree 15b0c45132e7ec11eec0d510b9da68313944acc1
parent 638a4c0bd8b53766faeb437244b2aae4eed28dcf
author fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1746635003 +0100
committer fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1748336229 +0100

guix: accomodate migration to codeberg

See https://guix.gnu.org/blog/2025/migrating-to-codeberg/.

When interacting with the old repo you may now also see:
```bash
warning: redirecting to https://codeberg.org/guix/guix/
```

events.message:
guix: accomodate migration to codeberg

See https://guix.gnu.org/blog/2025/migrating-to-codeberg/.

When interacting with the old repo you may now also see:
```bash
warning: redirecting to https://codeberg.org/guix/guix/
```

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -50,7 +50,7 @@ fi
 # across time.
 time-machine() {
     # shellcheck disable=SC2086
-    guix time-machine --url=https://git.savannah.gnu.org/git/guix.git \
+    guix time-machine --url=https://codeberg.org/guix/guix-mirror.git \
comments.body: Why switch to a [mirror](https://lists.gnu.org/archive/html/info-guix/2025-02/msg00000.html) set up three months ago rather then wait a bit and switch to https://codeberg.org/guix/guix.git, as described in https://issues.guix.gnu.org/76503?
